title: FOR SALE: Graded Old Judge (Some Tougher Players)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: Graded Old Judge (Some Tougher Players)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
I am going to keep a few of the cards in the photos but the graded cards listed below are available for sale if interested. Some of the raw cards may become available, but I will wait until I have them before I try to sell any of them to better evaluate condition.

Prices are somewhat negotiable and please keep in mind that I do not yet have these in hand and the prices that are listed are based only on the scans provided. That being said I will not likely raise any prices but some may go down if there is unseen problems such as any back damage but as they are graded somewhat low if the card front appears really nice the back probably has some sort of damage so it would take something significant to change the price too much. Many of these cards present well for their grade.


Henry Boyle (SGC 1.5)  $150
California Brown (SGC 1)  $120
Sid Farrar (SGC 1.5) Father of Famous Opera/Film star Geraldine Farrar $200
Bill George (SGC 1)  $150
Gil Hatfield (SGC 1)  $150
Jack O'Brien (Brooklyn-Outdoor) (SGC 1) $175
John O'Brien(Cleve) (SGC 1.5)  $150
Danny Richardson (SGC 1)  $150
Cub Stricker (SGC 1.5)  $175
Sy Sutcliffe (SGC 1.5)  $150
Count Weber (SGC 3)  $250

Also available for sale are the following that I have in hand.
Frank Wells (SGC 1.5) $165
[IMG]http://www.geocities.com/rhettmatthew_37/n172wells.JPG[/IMG]

Bill Sowders (was GAI 1.5 due to back crease, but has been liberated from tomb-great image) $175
[IMG]http://www.geocities.com/rhettmatthew_37/n172sowders.JPG[/IMG]



email directly to: rhettyeakley@netzero.com if interested.
-Rhett
